titleStmt.title: Little Iohn and the four beggers, a new merry song of Robin Hood and little John, shewing how Little John went a begging, and how he fought with four beggers, and what a prize he got of the four beggers, the tune is, Robin Hood and the begger.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
